products.title: Choices Pure Linen Roller Blind
products.description: The pure linen roller blind is just that pure linen. That means it has a beautiful, rustic quality and wonderful texture, helping you to create a lovely, natural look in any room. Much warmer than white, the sandy mushroom colourway produces a cosy and inviting feel allowing the pure linen roller blind is just that pure linen.
